content.description: Climb the short, thin slabby face up the center of the wall.
content.location: Enter the Corridors between "Klingons" and "From Mexico" and walk to the block at the end of this corridor. This route goes up the center of that face.  #3 in the 2019 guide.

content.description: This route can be climbed as a chimney (5.7), a layback using the opposite wall (5.8), or as a face climb without the opposite wall (5.10).
content.location: Route #2 in The Corridors in the 2019 guide.

content.description: A project route in The Corridors
content.location: Route #5 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Start in the corridor 5' right of "Climbing on Rainbows."  Climb face to small ramp then straight up to top.
content.protection: Three bolts and two top mussy hooks.
content.location: Enter the Corridors between "Klingons" and "From Mexico."  Walk to "Shapeshifter" and then to the right.  This route is the line of bolts to the right of "Climbing on Rainbows."  Route #7 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Face climb up clean rock to tricky move left and a balancy move to finish. Stiff for the grade.
content.location: Easier accessed from the Brutal block side of Corridors. This is the only sport route open this face and is directly across from "Dirty Bird" which is the easy trad route that goes up to anchors on that face. Route #9 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Start on the right side arete of the block. Climb friction and thin face holds to a horizontal rest. Move left and continue to top. Balance is the key to this climb.
content.location: This route is to the right of "The Thinker."  Route #4 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Climb the thin overhanging face to a tricky undercling move that will provide access to the large ledge and the top out to the right.
content.location: When walking past climbs #5-9 on Brutal Block, this route is on the adjacent face of the next block.  #11 in the Corridors on the 2019 guide.

content.description: Climb up through the overhanging arete. Work your way to the top using the arete and some holds to the right face.
content.location: Enter the Corridors between "Klingons" and "From Mexico."  Walk in the corridor, follow to Shapeshifter. Turn right and walk to end of that corridor.  This is the route that climbs the Arete to the left of "Climbing on Rainbows."  Route #8 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Start directly across from "Into the Light." Climb up the large holds to a right facing flake. Finish above.
content.location: Easier accessed from the Brutal block side of Corridors. Left side of the corridor across from Into the Light. Near Brutal exit. Route #10 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Climb to the right of the tree (the face directly in front of you when jumping from the rock to the root). Climb up the right side to the horizontal. Traverse to the left on the horizontal. Climb directly up the face to the top.
content.location: Enter the Corridors between "Klingons" and "From Mexico." Walk in the corridor, follow to "Shapeshifter" and then turn right.  This climb will be on the wall of the block at the end of the corridor in front of you.  Route #6 in The Corridors on 2019 guide.

content.description: Climb the tricky arete up past 2 bolts to a fun top out.
content.location: Enter the Corridors between "Klingons" and "From Mexico."  This climb is on the arete across from Shapeshifter. Route #1 in The Corridors in 2019 guide.

content.description: There are a few high quality climbs located in this area.  They stay very shady all year round.
